update dict_city set zip_code = #{zipCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, province_id = #{provinceId,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, is_enable = #{isEnable,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, add_time = #{addTime,jdbcType=NUMERIC} where city_id = #{cityId,jdbcType=NUMERIC}

from dict_city order by city_id asc
